panels.description: maybe some overlap but seems good

targets.targetFull: alias(round(diffSeries(sumSeries(absolute(removeEmptySeries(averageBelow(group(aliasByNode(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*.*, 7, 8), aliasByNode(exclude(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*, '_local'), 7)), -0.000001)))), alias(sumSeries(grep(absolute(removeEmptySeries(averageBelow(group(#O, #N), -0.000001))), 'Queen_bee|Carpenter_bee|upkeep(?!\.)')), 'managers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Honey_bee|upgrade')), 'upgrade'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Mason_bee|build')), 'build'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Garden_bumblebee|Ground_beetle|Dragonfly')), 'deposit'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Japanese_beetle')), 'mineral'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Scarabaeus_sacer')), 'energy'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Bumblebee|upkeep\.[a-z0-9]{4}')), 'haulers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Walking_stick|defense')), 'defense'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Orchid_Mantis|Firefly')), 'annexes'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Hercules_beetle|Atlas_moth|power')), 'power'), alias(grep(#C, 'Housefly|Luna_moth|European_hornet|Red_paper_wasp|Assasin_bug|Leaf_insect'), 'attackers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'factory|boosts')), 'production'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'export|terminal')), 'export')), 10), 'other')

targets.targetFull: alias(diffSeries(sumSeries(absolute(grep(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*.*, '\.spawn\.'))), alias(sumSeries(grep(absolute(grep(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*.*, '\.spawn\.')), 'Queen_bee|Carpenter_bee')), 'managers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Honey_bee')), 'upgrader'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Mason_bee')), 'builder'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Garden_bumblebee|Ground_beetle|Dragonfly')), 'deposits'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Japanese_beetle')), 'minerals'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Scarabaeus_sacer')), 'energy'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Bumblebee')), 'haulers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Walking_stick')), 'defense'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Orchid_Mantis|Firefly')), 'annexes'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Hercules_beetle|Atlas_moth')), 'power'), alias(grep(#C, 'Housefly|Luna_moth|European_hornet|Red_paper_wasp|Assasin_bug|Leaf_insect'), 'attack')), 'other')
